text: is a Japanese politician. He was the Minister for Internal Affairs and Communications from October 2021 to August 2022. He is a member of the House of Representatives as a member of the Liberal Democratic Party.Profile of Kaneko Yasushi on LDP website: jimin.jp/english/profile/members/114667.html (retrieved Dec 2, 2014) ==References== Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Living people Category:1961 births Category:People from Kumamoto Prefecture Category:Internal Affairs and Communications ministers of Japan
title: Yasushi Kaneko
